title: Apesokari Tholos tomb A
description: Minoan tomb in the Mesara Plain in south-central Crete dated to the Early Minoan II period (ca. 2200-2050 BCE) and in use until the Middle Minoan III period (ca. 1750-1675 BCE).

properties.description: Point representing the location of Apesokari Tholos Tomb A, derived from an OpenStreetMap Node after Flouda 2023.
properties.title: OSM location of Apesokari Tholos Tomb A
